alert.note: Alert for Florence (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 20 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Florence County through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sardis, or 11 miles southwest of Florence, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Timmonsville, Pamplico, Sardis, Hyman, Effingham, Friendfield, Claussen, New Hope, Evergreen and Coward. This includes Interstate 95 in South Carolina between mile markers 147 and 156. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
